thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: So much noise
thread.title_full: So much noise - Review of Premier Inn London Hammersmith Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Chris C
title: So much noise
text: This has to be the noiset Premier Inn I have stayed at, need to leave the TV on to drown out the outside noise. Lack of staff at Checkin etc made it feel unwelcoming. Which led to looking for other places to spend time during the stay so cannot comment on the rest if the facilities - not somewhere I would stay again though choice
